trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for each state of the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons in the **Start** menu.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.LogOffButtons> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons.
Gets a visual style element that represents the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons in the hot state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.LogOffButtons.Hot%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons in the hot state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons in the normal state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.LogOffButtons.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons in the normal state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons in the pressed state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.LogOffButtons.Pressed%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the **Log Off** and **Shut Down** buttons in the pressed state.
